description:
At Jane G. Cotton PC, a compassionate attorney guides people through complex and difficult circumstances. From her law office in Anderson, Indiana, Ms. Cotton handles family law and medical malpractice cases throughout Central Indiana, including in Madison, Hamilton and Delaware counties. She understands how sensitive these issues are and aggressively pursues a solution that is just and fair.

From the moment people meet with Ms. Cotton, they note her welcoming, friendly nature. She builds trusted relationships with clients. It is essential for her to understand someone's circumstances in order to reach their goals. Whether meeting at her law office, in the hospital or elsewhere, she and her clients are always in good communication with each other.

Ms. Cotton has successfully handled matters such as the following:

  • Family law: Custody, visitation, paternity and divorce
  • Medical malpractice: Failure to diagnose, surgical errors and birth injuries
  • civil litigation and appeals

When she is not with clients, Ms. Cotton is dedicated to enhancing her practice. She is a member of groups such as the Indiana State Bar Association and the Indiana Trial Lawyers Association. Through these organizations, her law office has access to an extensive network of resources and remains connected with emerging legal trends. To accommodate clients, Jane G. Cotton PC accepts credit cards and offers a free initial consultation for medical malpractice clients.
